article:
Miss Richards was a teacher at a school for boys and girls.She _ chemistry and physics from the lowest to the highest classes in the _ .Sometimes students learned them rapidly,but sometimes they were very slow ,and then Miss Richards had to _ things many times.
One year,the first class had been studying chemistry for several _ when Miss Richards suddenly asked,"What is water?Who knows? _ up?"
There was silence for a few seconds,and Miss Richards felt sad ,but then one boy _ his hand.
"Yes,Dick?"said Miss Richards encouragingly .He was not one of the brightest children in the class,so she was _ that he could answer.
"Water is a liquid which has no color until you wash your hands in it,Miss.Then it turns black,"the boy replied with great confidence .
